wikipedia_page.main: Nancy Mary Fairbrother (1913–1971) was an English writer and lecturer on landscape and land use. She was a Member of the UK Institute of Landscape Architects, now the Landscape Institute. Her brother (James Alick (Rex) Fairbrother) was also a landscape architect.

response: 1971 Nan Fairbrother, New Lives, New Landscapes
* Nan Fairbrother (1913–1971), an English writer and lecturer on landscape and land use
